title: Topic 003 Question 005
body: You have an Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) tenant that has the default App registrations settings. The tenant contains the users shown in the following table.
You purchase two cloud apps named App1 and App2. The global administrator registers App1 in Azure AD.
You need to identify who can assign users to App1, and who can register App2 in Azure AD.
What should you identify? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
